snippet: William A. Ackman steps down from the J.C. Penney board. | The question of who should foot the legal bill in white-collar cases has become an increasingly common one. | Six years after the peak of the housing boom, subprime borrowers continue to...
abstract: William A. Ackman steps down from the J.C. Penney board. | The question of who should foot the legal bill in white-collar cases has become an increasingly common one. | Six years after the peak of the housing boom, subprime borrowers continue to struggle. | It is not clear that anyone will want to buy BlackBerry.

headline.main: Ackman and Penney Directors Part Ways
